headlines.description: Chelsea are one win from a return to the Champions League after a comfortable 3-0 victory at home to Watford.

headlines.description: Manchester United will be playing Europa League football next season after the 1-1 draw away to bottom side Huddersfield.

video.headline: Huddersfield shock Manchester United to make it 1-1

headlines.shortLinkText: United draw at Huddersfield to end top 4 hopes

headlines.description: Arsenal's hopes of a top-four finish are all but over after their 1-1 draw against Brighton at the Emirates on Sunday.

video.headline: Arsenal's top 4 hopes in tatters after Brighton draw
